location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench and Robert Garden, Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter discusses the mistake the linguist made when having the Company's grants confirmed by Carem Caun [Karim Khan] by inserting the name Busheab instead of Bushire. The order is given for him to return to Isfahan and have this rectified immediately.
